name: Girl Rugby Dash
description:
It’s time to show that girls are as good at rugby, as boys! Start your training and be ready to win your first rugby football match!

Train sportswomen of the new rugby team. Run as fast as you can, don’t let anyone stop you. Your opponents will definitely try to knock you down so be careful and react quickly! Rugby is such a rough game, even for women!

Beware as the players of other teams want to interfere in your training! You can recognize them by their uniform colors. Just avoid them and don’t drop the ball!

Girl Rugby Dash key Features:
  • Captivating yet simple running game;
  • Mighty rugby sportswomen;
  • Cool and funny sports uniform;
  • Get ready for a true gridiron match by training in our game!

Train hard and be the rugby team #1!
